paragraphs.body: Finally, wishing for Katara to stop badgering him and to leave him alone, Aang explodes from his fortress with a fiery explosion akin to a volcanic eruption. Once he has cooled down, Aang sees that Katara has hidden herself behind a pillar to defend from the flaming rocks. He asks her if she is okay, to which she answers that she is fine and that she wants him to attempt that "'volcano' move" again so they can show it to ${link_0} later. Aang leaves her there without a word, prompting her to ask him if he is afraid of burning her again. He responds that he is more fearful that he will be the one who gets burned this time, and slashes through the heart he drew in the dirt with his foot.
